mapper.select: SELECT a.FLOOR_SEQ , a.FLOOR_NAME FROM tb_floorinfo a, lettccmmndetailcode b WHERE a.FLOOR_USEYN = 'Y' AND b.CODE = a.FLOOR_INFO AND a.CENTER_ID = #{centerId} ORDER BY b.CODE_DC ASC

SELECT a.FLOOR_SEQ, a.CENTER_ID, a.FLOOR_INFO, a.FLOOR_MAP, a.FLOOR_MAP1, a.FLOOR_NAME, a.SEAT_CNT, a.MEET_CNT,a.FLOOR_USEYN, a.FLOOR_PART, b.FLOOR_INFO FLOOR_INFO_CNT, a.REG_DATE, a.REG_ID, a.UPDATE_DATE,UPDATE_ID, c.CODE_DC FROM tb_floorinfo a, tb_centerinfo b, lettccmmndetailcode c WHERE FLOOR_SEQ = #{floorSeq} AND a.CENTER_ID = b.CENTER_ID AND a.FLOOR_INFO = c.CODE
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_floorinfo(CENTER_ID, FLOOR_INFO, FLOOR_MAP, FLOOR_MAP1, FLOOR_NAME, SEAT_CNT, MEET_CNT,FLOOR_USEYN, FLOOR_PART, REG_DATE, REG_ID, UPDATE_DATE,UPDATE_ID) VALUES (#{centerId}, #{floorInfo}, #{floorMap,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{floorMap1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{floorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 0, 0, #{floorUseyn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{floorPart,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NOW(), #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NOW(), #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
